text: Pucho ki kisa da hai jihara akasam ate dharati upara hai. Akho, sara kujha alaha da hai. Usa ne apane upara rahimata likha la'i hai. Uha yakinana hi tuhanu ki'amata de dina ikatha karega isa vica ko'i saka nahim'. Jinham lokam ne apane apa nu ghate vica pa'i'a uhi hana jihare usa upara imana nahi li'a'unde
